mapper.insert: INSERT INTO kb_task_assignment(id,task_id, assignee, assigner, reporter) VALUES (#{id},#{taskId}, #{assignee}, #{assigner}, #{reporter})
mapper.select: SELECT assignment.id,assignment.task_id,assignment.assignee,assignment.assigner,assignment.reporter,user.name FROM kb_task_assignment assignment LEFT JOIN kb_user user ON assignment.assignee=user.id WHERE id= #{id}
SELECT * FROM kb_task_assignment WHERE task_id= #{taskId} AND delete_status=0
mapper.delete: UPDATE kb_task_assignment SET delete_status=1 WHERE id=#{id}
